source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_SEQ_00<tab>Composure regained, Hermes is ready to return to his duties.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_SEQ_00<tab>Гермес готов возвращаться к своим обязанностям.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_TODO_02<tab>Use the lightning converger to create ball lightning.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_TODO_02<tab>Используйте преобразователь электричества, чтобы создать шаровую молнию.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_000<tab>It is held that all civil organizations should conduct their affairs with total transparency, and the Convocation is no exception.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_000<tab>Сказано, что все гражданские институты должны вести свои дела наиболее прозрачно, и Совет Четырнадцати - не исключение.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_001<tab>But that doesn't mean we are obligated to show our work to unknown entities such as you. Consider yourself privileged─and behave accordingly.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_001<tab>Но это не означает, что мы должны показывать нашу работу неизвестным сущностям вроде тебя. Считай, тебе дарована огромная честь - и веди себя соответственно.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_005<tab>Though I see new creations on a daily basis, here they look at them with a different eye. It will be interesting to observe Hermes at work.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_005<tab>Я занимаюсь концептами новых созданий каждый день, но здесь они имеют с ними дело вживую. Будет очень интересно поглядеть на Гермеса за работой.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_010<tab>This time we <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> get to go for a walk! Isn't it exciting?
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_010<tab>На этот раз... мы <var 1A 02 /var>все<var 1A 01 /var> идём на прогулку! Просто замечательно!

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_020<tab>If everyone is ready, there are a few creations I need to check on. First, we shall return to the spot where we found our wayward ambystoma.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_020<tab>Если все готовы, есть пара созданий, которых мне нужно проверить. Сперва вернёмся на место, где мы отыскали нашу своевольную амбистому.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_021<tab>Have care when you step outside a hub, for there may be more unruly creatures about.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_021<tab>Только осторожнее, когда ступите за границу городка - некоторые из существ могут быть опасны.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_030<tab>All vim and vigor now. Hmph. When we were discussing his nomination, he was melancholy incarnate.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_030<tab>Пф, ну ты погляди. Теперь энергия бьёт фонтаном. А когда мы говорили с ним о должности, он был воплощённой меланхолией.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_035<tab>Ah yes, the ianthine petalouda. One of the newest species of the ever-popular butterfly.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_035<tab>А, да, фиолетовая бабочка. Одна из новейших особей. Уже успела завоевать себе немалую популярность.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_036<tab>...Hm? You're still bothered about your robe? Don't be. The few specimens we repurposed won't be missed.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_036<tab>...Hm? You're still bothered about your robe? Don't be. The few specimens we repurposed won't be missed.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_040<tab>So beautiful, petalouda! I hope they make it into the world!
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_040<tab>So beautiful, petalouda! I hope they make it into the world!

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_050<tab>This here is a new species of petalouda we recently set loose.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_050<tab>This here is a new species of petalouda we recently set loose.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_051<tab>It has been doing very well, managing to maintain a stable existence thus far. If it can see its observation period to the end without issue, we shall release it unto the world.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_051<tab>It has been doing very well, managing to maintain a stable existence thus far. If it can see its observation period to the end without issue, we shall release it unto the world.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_052<tab>Tell me─do you know the difference between living beings and arcane entities?
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_052<tab>Tell me─do you know the difference between living beings and arcane entities?

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_053<tab>It is the presence of a soul. Yet the soul isn't something you can choose to have at will.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_053<tab>It is the presence of a soul. Yet the soul isn't something you can choose to have at will.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_054<tab>No, it manifests only in those beings whose forms adhere to the laws of creation. That can endure on their own.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_054<tab>No, it manifests only in those beings whose forms adhere to the laws of creation. That can endure on their own.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_055<tab>Beings that do not fulfill this requirement, such as those spontaneously born of magic or natural phenomena, do not have souls.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_055<tab>Beings that do not fulfill this requirement, such as those spontaneously born of magic or natural phenomena, do not have souls.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_056<tab>No matter how much it might resemble flora or fauna, if it lacks a soul, then it is considered an arcane entity.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_056<tab>No matter how much it might resemble flora or fauna, if it lacks a soul, then it is considered an arcane entity.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_057<tab>So you see, it is not for mankind to decide what is living. That domain lies beyond our manipulation, and it is hubris to assume otherwise.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_057<tab>So you see, it is not for mankind to decide what is living. That domain lies beyond our manipulation, and it is hubris to assume otherwise.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_058<tab>But come, let us head to the nearby beacon. I've received a report that arcane entities have gathered there.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_058<tab>But come, let us head to the nearby beacon. I've received a report that arcane entities have gathered there.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_060<tab>We're meant to be observing Hermes, but instead we're stuck with Meteion...
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_060<tab>We're meant to be observing Hermes, but instead we're stuck with Meteion...

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_061<tab>Well, I suppose she herself serves as proof of his prowess as a researcher and creator both.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_061<tab>Well, I suppose she herself serves as proof of his prowess as a researcher and creator both.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_065<tab>A fascinating creation─much like yourself, little one. Renowned as Hermes is for his flying life-forms, 'tis a rare privilege to be able to see one of his works in progress.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_065<tab>A fascinating creation─much like yourself, little one. Renowned as Hermes is for his flying life-forms, 'tis a rare privilege to be able to see one of his works in progress.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_070<tab>Interesting! You're interesting too! Tell me, how did you find the ambystoma?
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_070<tab>Interesting! You're interesting too! Tell me, how did you find the ambystoma?

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_080<tab>Ah, yes. Lightning pneuma, just as the report said.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_080<tab>Ah, yes. Lightning pneuma, just as the report said.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_081<tab>Although we call this structure a beacon due to its form, it's in fact a magical device. By manipulating the balance of elements, it keeps the isle airborne and maintains the climate thereupon.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_081<tab>Although we call this structure a beacon due to its form, it's in fact a magical device. By manipulating the balance of elements, it keeps the isle airborne and maintains the climate thereupon.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_082<tab>In the course of its operation, it often sees an internal shift towards a given element.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_082<tab>In the course of its operation, it often sees an internal shift towards a given element.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_083<tab>Right now that element is lightning, which draws the pneuma here to replenish their aether.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_083<tab>Right now that element is lightning, which draws the pneuma here to replenish their aether.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_085<tab>Would you care to assist me in her stead, and feed the pneuma?
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_085<tab>Would you care to assist me in her stead, and feed the pneuma?

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_086<tab>By using this lightning converger, you can harness ambient lightning and focus it into a ball. A veritable feast for our dazzling friends.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_086<tab>By using this lightning converger, you can harness ambient lightning and focus it into a ball. A veritable feast for our dazzling friends.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_090<tab>Go on and use the lightning converger near the pneuma. It will harness ambient lightning and focus it into a ball. A veritable feast for our dazzling friends.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_090<tab>Go on and use the lightning converger near the pneuma. It will harness ambient lightning and focus it into a ball. A veritable feast for our dazzling friends.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_101<tab>See how they gather to feed. How they express themselves through their actions despite their lack of words.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_101<tab>See how they gather to feed. How they express themselves through their actions despite their lack of words.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_102<tab>Speech is not the sole defining characteristic of a thinking, feeling creature. Nor is silence an indication that they do not possess these qualities.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_102<tab>Speech is not the sole defining characteristic of a thinking, feeling creature. Nor is silence an indication that they do not possess these qualities.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_103<tab>Be it a soulless arcane entity such as the pneuma, or an ephemeral life-form such as the petalouda, all seek to perpetuate their existence. To survive.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_103<tab>Be it a soulless arcane entity such as the pneuma, or an ephemeral life-form such as the petalouda, all seek to perpetuate their existence. To survive.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_107<tab>A good question. I can answer it from a theoretical standpoint, but it ultimately falls to the Bureau of the Architect to pass judgment.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_107<tab>A good question. I can answer it from a theoretical standpoint, but it ultimately falls to the Bureau of the Architect to pass judgment.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_108<tab>Those with exceptional vision such as Hythlodaeus may be able to ascertain her true nature...
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_108<tab>Those with exceptional vision such as Hythlodaeus may be able to ascertain her true nature...

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_109<tab>But to me, it doesn't matter. She is herself, and that is all I need to know.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_109<tab>But to me, it doesn't matter. She is herself, and that is all I need to know.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_110<tab>Oh... You've finished already? I-I'm sorry... I was in the way...
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_110<tab>Oh... You've finished already? I-I'm sorry... I was in the way...

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_111<tab>Not to worry, my dear. They missed nothing of note, and we still have plenty of work for them to observe.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_111<tab>Not to worry, my dear. They missed nothing of note, and we still have plenty of work for them to observe.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_112<tab>Next, we will head east to the Mourning Dew. I need to speak with some observers there.
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HERMES_000_112<tab>Next, we will head east to the Mourning Dew. I need to speak with some observers there.

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_120<tab>...Was there a guiding theme or any method to the madness that is this random assortment of features?
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_EMETSELCH_000_120<tab>...Was there a guiding theme or any method to the madness that is this random assortment of features?

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_125<tab>Ah, this fellow has been the talk of the bureau! The combination of a carefree aspect and endless rows of fangs is strangely charming!
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_HYTHLODAEUS_000_125<tab>Ah, this fellow has been the talk of the bureau! The combination of a carefree aspect and endless rows of fangs is strangely charming!

source: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_130<tab>It's adorable, but beware its sneeze! Hermes went flying once!
target: TEXT_AKTKME106_04424_METEION_000_130<tab>It's adorable, but beware its sneeze! Hermes went flying once!
